file_content.text: That was....
That was easily the toughest fight I've ever been in. I can see why Gorro fell to you.
Your hesitation does me no honor. I lost! Finish it!
[Kill him]
There. It's finished.
No, it's over.
We fought. You lost. Live with it.
You've learned not to cross me. I should think that's enough.
The show is over. Go about your business.
Frankly, I got better things to waste my ammo on.
I don't think I will. Don't see the point, really.
Show's over, folks.
You! Where do you think you're going?!
Yes, pirate scum, I am talking to you--the ones who killed my brother!
Yes, pirate scum, I am talking to you--the one who killed my brother!
I'd let the meaning of that fact sink in a second before you act....
That's right. Now back away.
No, you think a second--about what you have done and how you are going to pay for it!
If you and that Rodian are related, I'd hate to see what you came from.
Your... brother?
We might not have been true brothers, but we were brothers in the hunt. Brothers in glory. Brothers in making pain.
Okay, let's see what you've got, ugly.
And you're next. [Square off]
I am banned from twenty-six systems for acts so unspeakable we do not have words for them. This will not end well for you.
You should never have remained in plain sight, because now you die!
There you are, scum!
You kill my brother, then dare to show your face in the street? Gorro deserved better!
I didn't want to hurt him.
Your brother attacked me. I had no choice but to defend myself.
I'm sorry for your loss. I never wanted to fight your brother.
Fighting your brother was never part of the plan. But he wouldn't back down.
Gorro started that fight. I never wanted to tangle with him.
He probably saw what I see now--that you are filth worthy only of death!
You're Gorro's brother? How does that work?
How can you be his brother?
We were brothers in battle! In the blood of those we crushed together!
Let's get this over with.
Idiots have been getting in my way all day. One more won't make a difference.
Your brother earned the death he got. Are you following in his footsteps?
I've still got plenty of ammo. You want to make the same mistake as your brother, be my guest.
I've had enough nonsense for one day. You want to fight me, fine. Just don't talk.
For Gorro!
I've never seen anyone fight like that... Gorro never had a chance....
You've proven your skill. Don't stand there and gloat--finish it!
No. I won't kill you.
I'm sparing you. I wish I could have done the same for your brother--please remember that.
I came here for answers, not for blood. Go.
You aren't dying today, pal. Go on--get out of here.
You shouldn't believe everything you hear. In fact, if you could tell people how I'm not a cold-blooded murderer, I'd appreciate it.
[Kill him]
